${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Connected cloud infrastructure means happy retail customers Increasing expectations from digital-savvy retail consumers require an understanding of their use of technology and lifestyle. Your ability to deliver innovative interactions and services, that build brand loyalty, will depend on a flexible and scalable technology infrastructure. To learn more read, “Critical Foundation of Customer Experience <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201689]]>” to find out how your technology infrastructure can advance your company’s digital transformation and improve customer satisfaction.
